messages.content:
Mostly blue during a clear day. That blue comes from sunlight scattering in the atmosphere. It changes with time and conditions:

- Sunrise/sunset: red, orange, pink
- Cloudy/overcast: gray
- Night: dark blue to black
- Sometimes other colors appear (greenish, yellowish) due to pollution, dust, or auroras

If you tell me your time and place, I can give a more exact description for right now.
